neighbors.name: Lawrence D. Meyer & Mary Y. Meyer
neighbors.claims: Public property records associate the PIN 209902 with a single-family residential home (built 1978) on approximately 0.37 acres at 9718 Hurrelbrink Rd, rather than a large agricultural holding [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/9718-Hurrelbrink-Rd-Kansas-City-KS-66109/75717299_zpid/). A Lawrence D. Meyer was historically listed as an amateur radio operator in the Kansas City area [Internet Archive](https://archive.org/stream/Winter_1991_Radio_Amateur_Callbook/Winter_1991_Radio_Amateur_Callbook_District_0_djvu.txt).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach as a residential neighbor rather than a farm operator. Focus on visual screening and property value protection, as the property appears to be a single-family home in a subdivision rather than a large agricultural tract.

citations.claim: PIN 209902 is a single-family residential home on ~0.37 acres
citations.title: 9718 Hurrelbrink Rd Property Details

citations.claim: Lawrence D. Meyer listed as amateur radio operator
citations.title: Winter 1991 Radio Amateur Callbook

neighbors.name: Cory M. Appl & Stefanie L. Appl
neighbors.claims: Cory Appl is the Administrator of Spectrum Home Health, Inc., a healthcare agency based in Independence, MO, which serves the Kansas City area [ProPublica](https://projects.propublica.org/nonprofits/organizations/481160123). In 2015, he ran for a seat on the Piper School Board (USD 203), participating in a field of candidates focused on school facilities and finance [Wyandotte Daily](https://wyandotteonline.com/voters-to-go-to-polls-tuesday/). He has been identified as a resident of the Piper area [Wyandotte Daily](https://wyandotteonline.com/voters-to-go-to-polls-tuesday/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Healthcare administrator; former school board candidate

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through school or community meetings, highlighting how development plans support local services and property values. Connect on shared community goals (e.g., quality schools) to address any concerns within a collaborative, locally-driven dialogue.

citations.claim: Cory Appl is Administrator of Spectrum Home Health, Inc.
citations.title: Spectrum Health Foundation Inc - Nonprofit Explorer

citations.claim: Ran for Piper School Board in 2015
citations.title: Voters to go to polls Tuesday - Wyandotte Daily

neighbors.name: Jennifer Masters
neighbors.claims: Jennifer Masters is listed as a resident of 9724 Hurrelbrink Rd, which corresponds to PIN 209901 [National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/m/jennifer-masters/ks/). Property records describe this parcel as a single-family residential home on approximately 0.37 acres, built in 1978, rather than a large agricultural tract [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/9724-Hurrelbrink-Rd-Kansas-City-KS-66109/75717283_zpid/). She has no documented public stance on development in Wyandotte County records accessible at this time.
neighbors.influence_justification: Residential homeowner; no public profile found

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out personally to understand her perspective. Since the property is residential and not agricultural, focus discussions on visual screening, construction setbacks, and maintaining the quiet character of the subdivision.
